item.title: index
item.description: Welcome to my Online vault of notes! This is where Iâ€™ll put all of my notes. Notes: Web and Mobile Application Development .

item.title: fieldset
item.description: HTML Fieldset Tag The <fieldset> tag in HTML is used to group related elements within a form.

item.title: HTML Tags
item.description: HTML Tags List HTML Tags are fundamental elements used to structure and format content on web pages.

item.title: code
item.description: The HTML <code> tag is a semantic element used to define a piece of computer code.

item.title: div
item.description: HTML <div> tag The <div> tag divides contents into sections and serve as flexible container for text, images and links.

item.title: caption
item.description: The <caption> tag in HTML is used to provide a title or description for a <table> element.

item.title: button
item.description: HTML Button Tag The <button> tag in HTML is used to create clickable buttons on a web page.

item.title: break
item.description: HTML br Tag The <br> tag in HTML is used to create a line break in the text, causing the content that follows it to appear on a new line.

item.title: bold
item.description: The <b> Tag The <b> tag in HTML is used to make the enclosed text bold, giving it greater emphasis or visual importance.

item.title: body
item.description: HTML body Tag The <body> tag in HTML defines the main content of a web page and is always placed within the html tag as its last child.
